Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naanantara-nasamanantara
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naanantara-nasamanantara
37.
217Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naanantarapaccayā…  nasamanantarapaccayā—  kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (Naanantarapaccayampi nasamanantarapaccayampi naārammaṇapaccayasadisaṃ.)
<< Naadhipatiup Naaññamañña >>
